title: PRQL: a simple, powerful, pipelined SQL replacement
dot:
digraph PRQL{rankdir=LR;node[shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=12];edge[fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];DataEngineers[label="For Data Engineers
â€¢ Concise syntax
â€¢ Database agnostic
â€¢ Embedding SQL
â€¢ Language bindings
â€¢ Column lineage & type inspection" fillcolor="#A4C8E5" style="filled"];Analysts[label="For Analysts
â€¢ Ergonomic for data exploration
â€¢ Simple & easy to understand
â€¢ Powerful autocomplete & error messages" fillcolor="#E6A1D7" style="filled"];Tools[label="For Tools
â€¢ Open-source foundation
â€¢ Growing secular standard
â€¢ Easy for machines to read & write" fillcolor="#F6D8A0" style="filled"];HNEnthusiasts[label="For HackerNews Enthusiasts
â€¢ Written in Rust
â€¢ Orthogonal language features" fillcolor="#F4A5A5" style="filled"];Showcase[label="Showcase
â€¢ PRQL transformations as a pipeline
â€¢ Modern syntax & features
â€¢ Example queries" fillcolor="#D0F3D6" style="filled"];Principles[label="Principles
â€¢ Pipelined
â€¢ Simple
â€¢ Open
â€¢ Extensible
â€¢ Analytical" fillcolor="#F7D2A9" style="filled"]; DataEngineers->Showcase[label="Supports Engineer Needs"];Analysts->Showcase[label="Supports Analyst Needs"];Tools->Showcase[label="Tools Compatibility"];HNEnthusiasts->Showcase[label="Built in Rust"]; Principles->DataEngineers;Principles->Analysts;Principles->Tools;Principles->HNEnthusiasts; subgraph cluster_Showcase{label="Showcase";style=dashed;color=gray;node[shape=ellipse, fontname="Helvetica", fontsize=10];"PRQL Query 1"[label="from employees
select {id, first_name, age}
sort age
take 10" shape=rect];"SQL Query 1"[label="SELECT id, first_name, age
FROM employees
ORDER BY age
LIMIT 10" shape=rect]; "PRQL Query 2"[label="from track_plays
filter plays > 10_000
filter (length | in 60..240)
filter recorded > @2008-01-01" shape=rect];"SQL Query 2"[label="SELECT *
FROM track_plays
WHERE plays > 10000 AND length BETWEEN 60 AND 240
AND recorded > DATE '2008-01-01'
ORDER BY length DESC" shape=rect]; "PRQL Query 3"[label="from employees
# filter before aggregations...
filter start_date > @2021-01-01
group country (
  aggregate {max_salary = max salary}
)
# filter after aggregations!
filter max_salary > 100_000" shape=rect];"SQL Query 3"[label="SELECT country, MAX(salary) AS max_salary
FROM employees
WHERE start_date > DATE '2021-01-01'
GROUP BY country
HAVING MAX(salary) > 100000" shape=rect];}subgraph cluster_Principles{label="PRQL Principles";style=dotted;color=blue;node[shape=box];"Pipelined"[label="A linear pipeline of transformations" shape=rect];"Simple"[label="Small number of powerful & orthogonal primitives" shape=rect];"Open"[label="Fully open-source and compatible" shape=rect];"Extensible"[label="Built to be extended and adaptable" shape=rect];"Analytical"[label="Focuses on analytical queries" shape=rect];}"PRQL Query 1"->"SQL Query 1"[label="Transforms PRQL to SQL"];"PRQL Query 2"->"SQL Query 2"[label="Transforms PRQL to SQL"];"PRQL Query 3"->"SQL Query 3"[label="Transforms PRQL to SQL"]; Integrations[label="Integrations
â€¢ ClickHouse
â€¢ Jupyter/IPython
â€¢ DuckDB
â€¢ qStudio
â€¢ Prefect" fillcolor="#F9E79F" style="filled"];Tools->Integrations; Bindings[label="Bindings
â€¢ prqlr (R)
â€¢ prqlc (Rust)
â€¢ Others in Java, .NET, PHP" fillcolor="#A3D6C6" style="filled"];Tools->Bindings;}
